content: I've been experimenting with different types of wood chips for smoking, and I recently picked up some applewood chips that added a nice fruity flavor to the asparagus I grilled a week ago. I've also been trying to perfect my BBQ sauce recipe, and I recently tried out a new recipe I found online that turned out amazing - the perfect balance of sweet and tangy. Do you have any tips on how to pair BBQ sauce with grilled vegetables?
